answers.answer: I had exactly the same, I had to go as my mum had gestational diabetes when she was preggo with me and my brother, its a boring wait and I won't be taking my partner if I have to have it again! All he did was moan that he was bored and tired lol MEN! after all that I didn't have diabetes so that was a plus ;)

I had to do the 3 hour test ugh I hated it and I was so hungry. Hope your test turns out OK.

question: So sick of going to doctor. My blood presurre is up and i just failed my first glucose test. Now i have to do the 3 hour glucose test. What else can go wrong!!!!
title: sick of going to the doctor
